sources.title: Subzero | Full Movie | Action Adventure | Costas Mandylor | Nia Peeples
sources.description:
Subzero - After a satellite containing classified information crashes into a mountain peak, a team of experienced climbers and military personnel must race to retrieve the sensitive data despite the risk of an impending blizzard and avalanche.
2005.  Stars: Costas Mandylor, Nia Peeples, Linden Ashby
*Licensed from Vision Films Inc. All rights reserved*

metadata.Genre: Animation, Action, Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller
metadata.Plot: Mr. Freeze is living in the arctic with his cryogenically-frozen wife. When a submarine destroys her containment capsule, he has to find someone to "donate" a new heart for her. His search turns up one donor with the right blood type: Barbara (Batgirl) Gordon. Her kidnapping sends Batman and Robin on a hurried chase to free her in time.
metadata.Writer: Randy Rogel, Boyd Kirkland, Bob Kane (created by: Batman)
metadata.Actors: Kevin Conroy, Michael Ansara, Loren Lester, Efrem Zimbalist Jr.
